ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The author is grateful to the World Bank and the Inter-University Council of East Africa (IUCEA) for the scholarship awarded to him through the Africa Centre of Excellence II in Phytochemicals, Textiles and Renewable Energy (ACE II PTRE) at Moi University, Kenya, that prompted this ethnomedical communication. The author commends preceding authors for their fruitful quest for knowledge on medicinal plants utilized by rural communities of Kenya and Eastern Africa as a whole.
